fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Remember a dead town role, becoming that role. You cannot remember unique roles or Town Power roles.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the start of the game, you do not know you are **I forgor**. You are instead given another Town Support role, having that role's abilities/attributes. At the end of N2, you lose that role and learn you are **I forgor**.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town __**or**__ kill all who oppose the Daily Streak Faction.
